title: BBC Local Live: Sheffield and South Yorkshire on Friday 9 September - BBC News
summary: news , sport , weather and travel updates resume at 08:00 on monday .
sheffield tv presenter tweets thanks after rio illness drama .
strip club intended to offer 'mother-in-law death packages ' .
labour by-election loss blamed on 'corbyn factor ' .
yorkshire beat durham to stay in title hunt .
kell brook predicts dream finish to big title fight .

documents.title: five things we did n't know this morning
text: we 're back on monday at 0:800 , meanwhile here 's a recap on five things most of us did n't know when we dragged ourselves out of bed this morning :
so kel has a huge weekend ahead of him , and whatever you 're doing i hope it 's a good one .
to end , here 's a glorious scene in stannington sent in by bbc weather watcher the wendy house and remember you can send us your and videos here - we 'd love to share them .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: south yorkshire 's weather : wind and rain ahead this evening
text: the winds continue to strengthen across yorkshire this evening , and a band of rain will slowly spread towards the east .
minimum temperature of about 14c ( 57f ) .
a cloudy start to the day tomorrow with any rain gradually easing and clearing .
a brighter story throughout the afternoon , dry with sunny spells and highs 17c ( 63f ) - feeling fresher than recently , despite a lighter breeze .
author: Owain Wyn Evans
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: mystery art in sheffield canal basin
text: i often cycle along the paths at sheffield canal basin , and recently these beauties have been appearing .
someone 's clearly having some fun , any ideas who it is ?
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: police car 'rammed during car stop '
text: a police operation to stop a driver in a car park in the handsworth area of sheffield earlier ended with one of the force 's vehicles being rammed .

a man 's now in custody and police say he 's being questioned over serious assault , being disqualified from driving , having no insurance , possession of drugs and breach of court-imposed bail conditions .

documents.title: behind the scenes with the bbc on stannage edge
text: the famous red sofa of bbc breakfast went walkabout today in the peak district .
the programme came live from stannage edge , of all places .
here 's a short behind-the scenes view of the crew doing their thing :
author: Oli Constable
Reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: barnsley 's big fire fall out : update
text: disruption following the fire at the former chicago rock building in barnsley town centre should now be reducing , barnsley council has said .
new street is now open to traffic and the pedestrian crossings on westway leading to new street have also been re-opened .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: travel update : delays on a1 ( m ) and in new rossington
text: there are currently a couple of traffic hotspots to be aware of in south yorkshire if you 're heading out into the rush hour :
there 's queuing traffic and heavier than usual traffic on the a1 ( m ) northbound between j36 a630 warmsworth road and j37 , a635 ( marr ) .
and the b6463 sheep bridge lane in new rossington is closed and there 's slow traffic in both directions between the station road and kestrel drive junctions due to an accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: watch : medical marvel quads off to school
text: today 's a big day for quads from rotherham who made medical history .
the girls , caroline , darcy , alexis and elisha clark , were the uk 's first set of same-sex quadruplets born from a single embryo .
we 've paid them a visit :
author: Andy Kershaw
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: doncaster 's coppinger has reasons to be cheerful
text: it 's set to be a great weekend for james coppinger at doncaster rovers - and it 's already started well .
ahead of his 500th appearance for doncaster , he 's been named the league two player of the month .
the 35-year-old has scored twice , and set up three goals this term already .
but he 's admitted to bbc radio sheffield that he has previously come `` really close '' to leaving doncaster .
`` when you have a football career you can play for different clubs , you can play for different reasons , you can play for the money , you can move to earn more .
or play at a higher level .
`` but , for me , that 's never been my focus .
my focus has been to be happy and to enjoy my football . ''
author: Andy Giddings
Sports Editor, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: sir cliff richard : second challenge to sex charges decision
text: a second alleged sexual abuse victim of sir cliff richard has challenged a decision not to bring charges against him , prosecutors have said .
the crown prosecution service said last month it was reviewing one case after a request by a male complainant , and another has now requested a review .
in june it said there was `` insufficient evidence '' to prosecute sir cliff over claims made by four men of sex offences between 1958 and the early 1980s .
sir cliff has always denied the claims .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: watch : kate bush appears in sheffield well , nearly
text: well , wuther my heights , missus .
we 've had a visitation .
that there kate bush , no less well , almost .
it 's actually impersonator lorrie brown , who 's paid a visit to bbc radio sheffield :
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: strip club intended to offer 'mother-in-law death packages '
text: an application to open a strip club in sheffield offering packages celebrating the death of mothers-in-law has been withdrawn .
villa mercedes cancelled its bid for a sexual entertainment venue licence in sheffield after objections were made to its `` deeply misogynistic '' advertising .
more than 180 objections were received against the planned venue on leadmill road .
the company , rockwave leisure ltd , has said it will issue a statement in `` due course '' .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: face-to-face well , it 's what they do , innit ?
text: two boxers , close enough to get married - but not showing much love .
kell brook faces off with gennady golovkin at their weigh-in in london .
they can whack on some weight now or maybe brook has upped his kilos far enough already for the fight tomorrow .
kell brook & ggg both come in at 11st 5 .
brook was pumped up at the weigh in watch it here # brookggg
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: yorks beat durham to stay in title hunt
text: yorks beat durham to stay in title hunt

documents.title: sheffield tv presenter tweets thanks after rio drama

sheffield-born charlie fell seriously ill after a mammoth charity bike ahead of the olym ended up on life support :
a big thank you to the doctor 's in rio and to the exceptional nhs and all the wonderful staff at st james for literally saving my life .

documents.title: campaigners celebrate as lap dancing club plans scrapped
text: they said it was a bad plan from day one .
now campaigners are celebrating news that plans for a new lap dancing club in the city centre have been dropped .
the idea was for a club called villa mercedes at the top of leadmill road .
but , after nearly 200 objections were received and more than 20 people spoke out at a council licensing meeting , the company behind the plans , rockwave leisure , has decided to withdraw the plan .
campaigner charlotte mead has told bbc radio sheffield she 's relieved the plans have been withdrawn :
author: Toby Foster
Presenter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: south yorkshire 's weather : cloud and rain ahead this afternoon
text: thicker cloud will increase this afternoon with the risk of some patchy rain across the pennines by mid afternoon .
the rain will reach more southern parts during the evening .
the top temperature will be about 21c ( 70f ) with a fresh southwest wind .
author: Clare Nasir
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: travel update : delays on woodhead pass
text: drivers are being warned of very slow traffic on the a628 woodhead pass in both directions in dunford bridge at dunford bridge turn off in the roadworks area .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: your headlines this lunchtime
text: the top stories from our sheffield newsroom so far today include :
author: BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: efforts to protect hardwick hall from hs2 plans
text: the national trust has appointed landscape architecture specialists cookson and tickner to develop a proposal to mitigate the impact .
of the proposed hs2 high speed rail route on hardwick hall in derbyshire .

the main line of hs2 between birmingham and leeds is planned to pass through the national trust 's estate at hardwick , which dates back to the 1500s and is one of the most visited attractions in the country .
the current hs2 plans take the railway within about 100m of hardwick 's registered park and garden , forging a corridor up to 300m wide and more than 2km long , through hardwick 's estate .
if hs2 is built along this route , there will be highly significant and detrimental impacts on hardwick 's internationally important heritage , and precious much visited natural places . ''
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: appeal over life-threatening injuries crash in doncaster
text: a man 's been left critically injured after being struck by a van in doncaster .
it happened on sheffield road in warmsworth yesterday afternoon .
police are keen to hear from any witnesses .
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield news

documents.title: yorkshire air ambulance 's new £ 6m copter carries first patients
text: the first patients have been carried by yorkshire 's new state-of-the-art air ambulance which came into service just a few days ago .
yorkshire air ambulance 's £ 6m airbus h145 helicopter is the first of two which are due to replace the charity 's current ageing aircraft .
the first jobs for the crew of the new h145 included a fall from height near lofthouse , west yorkshire , and a horse rider .
from high hoyland near barnsley who needed taking to leeds general infirmary for treatment .
the copter is based at yorkshire air ambulance 's base at nostell near wakefield .
a second h145 is due to be operational by the end of the year , flying from the charity 's northern base at raf topcliffe , near thirsk .

documents.title: joint prince 's trust first for emergency services
text: a new partnership between the fire and police services in south yorkshire for the prince 's trust is said to be the first of its kind .

team programme is a 12-week personal development course for unemployed 16- to 25-year-olds which is said to offer work experience , qualifications , practical skills , community projects and a residential week .

south yorkshire police 's deputy team leader paul hamshaw says : `` it 's a fantastic opportunity for young people who are out of education or employment to come and learn new skills , meet new friends and gain work experience . ''
author: Gina Bolton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: street drinking operation in sheffield
text: a man was arrested by police officers patrolling a sheffield suburb in a crackdown on street drinking .
extra police patrols of woodhouse have been ordered following an increasing number of complaints from residents about street drinking and drunken behaviour .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: rotherham 's medical history quads go to school
text: it 's a big day today in rotherham for the four young girls below .
they 're caroline , darcy , alexis and elisha clark and they made the headlines and medical history when they were born .
they were the uk 's first set of same sex quadruplet children born from a single embryo - and today 's their very first day at school .
quads first day at school !
caroline , darcy , alexis and elisha clark from # rotherham made medical history in 2013 !
author: Andy Kershaw
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: county championship day four : yorkshire v durham
text: yorkshire are in a very strong position against durham as they seek a third successive county championship title .
you can get the very latest from headingley with our live scorecard and keep up-to-date with live bbc local radio commentary .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: watch : 'fly-through ' tour of doncaster 's national college for high speed rail
text: in september of next year we 'll see the opening of the national college for high speed rail in doncaster .
it 'll be the base for thousands of new engineers being trained in order to create rail developments such as the new hs2 high speed rail line .
a video has been produced showing what the college will look like :
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: labour loss in sheffield by-election blamed on 'corbyn factor '
text: the liberal democrats have taken a seat from labour in a council by- election in sheffield .
the winning candidate , gail smith - who 'd lost the seat to labour in 2012 - got 1,711 votes this time - 400 more than labour .
here she sums up why she thinks she won :
meanwhile , labour councillor for the same ward , tony downing , told bbc radio sheffield that labour 's leadership contest played a big factor in the party 's defeat :
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: kell brook predicts dream finish to big title fight
text: sheffield 's kell brook faces a big challenge tomorrow , perhaps the biggest one of his eventful career .
he 's already a world champion of course , but in stepping up two weight divisions this weekend he aims to win the world middleweight title .
by any standards it 'd be an extraordinary feat , especially as his opponent , genady golovkin , is widely regarded as the most feared fighter in the game .
but brook has been telling us he has dreamt about exactly how the fight will finish :
author: Rob Staton
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: barnsley fire update : roads poised to re-open
text: we 've been given an update on demolition work following a big fire in barnsley town centre .
the former chicago rock club was wrecked in the blaze and some roads remain affected by the aftermath .
barnsley council says things are going as planned and new street and wellington house ( including central library services ) will re-open on monday .
however , the council said it would be reviewing safety cordons and damage to any roads or pavements every few hours to see if it could get these areas opened any earlier .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: watch : your friday weather forecast
text: lovely start to the day , here 's what 's in store for us :
author: Clare Nasir
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: labour lose by-election in sheffield following councillor 's death
text: the liberal democrats have taken a seat on sheffield city council from labour .
the vote came in mosborough following the death of the labour councillor isobel bowler .
the seat went to the liberal democrats with a 32 % swing .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield

documents.title: didcot power station body identified
text: the man recovered from under the rubble of didcot a power station on wednesday has been identified as 57-year-old ken cresswell from rotherham .
thames valley police said his had been informed and were being given support .
mr cresswell is the third victim to be recovered since the boiler house partially collapsed in february .
john shaw , 61 , also from rotherham , is the last workman yet to be found .

documents.title: good morning
text: another sunny start and a warm welcome on friday 9 september .
i 'll be bringing you updates of news , sport , weather and travel across south yorkshire until 18:00 .
the weather forecast is on its way , but let 's kick off with a corking photo taken by 'the coach ' , one of our weather watchers in sheffield .
you can send us your of bugs , pets , weather views and anything else , we 'd love to share them , and they can be sent by clicking this link .
author: Mick Lunney
BBC Local Live, Sheffield
